name: Touch-wsgi
tagline: Sublime-Text 2 plugin to touch all WSGI files.
body:
Touch-WSGI
==========

Sublime-Text 2 plugin to touch all WSGI files in currently open folders, in the current window, so you don't have to.

This is available in the [Sublime Text Package Control](https://sublime.wbond.net/packages/Touch%20WSGI).

Searches the Currently open folders (not subfolders) for files with the extension of `wsgi` and `touch`es  the file.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
